properties.areaDesc: Randall; Potter; Deaf Smith; Oldham; Palo Duro Canyon
properties.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 29 at 2:28PM CST until February 29 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo TX
properties.description:
* Affected Area...In Texas...Oldham...Potter...Deaf Smith...
Randall and Palo Duro Canyon.

* 20 Foot Winds...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph.

* Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent.

* Red Flag Threat Index...3 to 5.

* Timing...Critical fire weather conditions are expected to
begin around 10 AM to 12 PM and then are expected to end
around 7 PM to 9 PM this evening.
properties.instruction:
A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions
are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of
strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will
create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid
activities that promote open flames and sparks.

NWSheadline: RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE SOUTHWEST AND SOUTH CENTRAL TEXAS PANHANDLE
